name: Vangsluagh
description: The Vangsluagh is a chaotic evil aberration known for its unsettling ability to wreak havoc on spellcasters and disturb the battlefield with its incessant noise. It has an average build with a uniquely cacophonous presence.
memorable: The Vangsluagh's Distracting Cacophony ability disrupts spellcasting, making it particularly dangerous for magic-adept foes.
goals: To disrupt enemies in battle, particularly spellcasters, and create chaos.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other aberrations or chaos-themed creatures.
environment: Often found in places of magical upheaval or chaos.
strengths: Immunity to thunder damage and the ability to disrupt spellcasting.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks due to its Constant Racket.
attacks: Employs two tentacle lash attacks causing bludgeoning damage and a Sonic Bullet attack inflicting thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: Agonizing Trill, which can stun creatures within range.
additional_information: Uses Sonic Bullet to inflict deafness.
Tentacle lash attacks have a reach of 10 feet.
Can stun multiple creatures at once with Agonizing Trill.
Attempts to maintain chaos in combat.
